alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, Broadwater, and Jefferson Counties through 430 PM MDT... At mid afternoon, thunderstorms were developing across the region. These storms will gradually strengthen and may produce locally gusty winds and occasional lightning. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations potentially impacted include... Helena, Townsend, Boulder, East Helena, Whitehall, Montana City, Basin, Toston, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Cardwell, Winston, Radersburg, Silos, Clancy and Jefferson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near a lake, be prepared to get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle if a thunderstorm approaches. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter if storms approach.
